title: Installation issue: umpire
body:
In #19411 `camp` was added as a dependency of `umpire`, but the source checksum of `camp` was wrong, so the `umpire` build didn't get a chance to run.  Then #19543 fixed that problem so that `camp` built, but now the `umpire` build fails during the configuration phase with a lot errors like the following:

```
  >> 66     CMake Error at /home/software/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_pla
            ceholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_p
            laceholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path
            _placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_pa
            th_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_
            path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spac
            k_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/sp
            ack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/
            spack_/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.3.0/blt-0.3.6-gn3xknsnfg5qkpn
            vkzcmdrlivwiudzm6/cmake/BLTPrivateMacros.cmake:338 (target_link_lib
            raries):
     67       Error evaluating generator expression:
     68
     69         $<LINK_LANGUAGE:Fortran>
     70
     71       Expression did not evaluate to a known generator expression
     72     Call Stack (most recent call first):
     73       /home/software/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spac
            k_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/sp
            ack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/
            spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholde
            r/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placehol
            der/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeh
            older/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_plac
            eholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_/linux-
            ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.3.0/blt-0.3.6-gn3xknsnfg5qkpnvkzcmdrlivwiu
            dzm6/cmake/BLTMacros.cmake:604 (blt_setup_target)
     74       examples/CMakeLists.txt:70 (blt_add_executable)
``` 

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install umpire
```

The above command currently picks up `umpire@4.1.2`.

### Information on your system

This happened on `linux-ubuntu18.04`, attempting to build for `x86_64` target architecture, using a system-provided `gcc@7.3.0`.  The version of `spack` was:

```
$ spack --version
 0.15.4-1688-9b809e01b
```

### Additional information

These builds are running as part of an automated gitlab build pipeline, I have attached the pipeline log as well as the spack build output below.

[pipeline_log.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5453182/pipeline_log.28.txt)
[spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5453184/spack-build-out.12.txt)
